name: Konohagakure
description: The Hidden Leaf Village is known for its strong military and has produced many powerful shinobi.

name: Sunagakure
description: The Hidden Sand Village specializes in wind-based techniques and is surrounded by a desert.

name: Kirigakure
description: The Hidden Mist Village is known for its mist-covered environment and skilled swordsmen.

name: Kumogakure
description: The Hidden Cloud Village specializes in lightning-based techniques and is home to the Raikage.

name: Iwagakure
description: The Hidden Stone Village is known for its strong and enduring shinobi.

name: Amegakure
description: The Hidden Rain Village is associated with political unrest and criminal organizations.
